__e: She doesn't make me feel like the only thing stopping her from being happy... is me.
But then you have kids and try to lead what's called a grown-up life, and those sort of things become obstacles to a sane existence.
What happened with you and your sister is between you and your sister but your secret is in the way of a truth we must uncover.
One potential obstacle destroyed. Now to finish off the other.
- And then there's the biggest obstacle of all.
